content: परिभाषा {@--1@} Speech, discourse. {@--2@} Censurc, reproof, blame, abuse. {@--3@} An explanation. {@--4@} Terminology, technical phraseology, technical terms (used in a work); इति परिभाषाप्रकरणं <ls>Sk.</ls>; इको गुणवृद्धीत्यादिका परिभाषा <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--5@} (Hence) Any general rule, precept, or definition which is applicable throughout ( अनियमनिवारको न्यायविशेषः); परितः प्रमिताक्षरापि सर्वं विषयं प्राप्तवती गता प्रतिष्ठां . न खलु प्रतिहन्यते कदाचित् परिभाषेव गरीयसी यदाज्ञा <ls>Śi. 16. 80.</ls> {@--6@} A list of abbreviations or signs used in any work. {@--7@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) An explanatory Sūtra mixed up with the other Sūtras of Pāṇini, which teaches the method of applying them. {@--8@} (In medicine) Prognosis.
